casebody.data:
No. 76974 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED OCTOBER 12, 2018

MEGA METALS AND IRON, a Nevada Corporation; Scott Parris, an Individual; Mario Plascenscia, an Individual; and Dmitry Gortovnik, an Individual, and Collectively in their Capacity as Owners and Officers of Mega Metals and Iron, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Nancy L. Allf, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Joseph Chen, an Individual; and Celia Chen, an Individual, Real Parties in Interest.

DENIED.
